name: HERCULES Cost-Effective Super Cast 8 Strands Braided Fishing Line 10LB to 300LB Test for Salt-Water,109/328/547/1094 Yards(100M/300M/500M/1000M),Diam.#0.12MM-1.2MM,Hi-Grade Performance,Variety Colors
short_description: Same Quality, Much Less Expensive - You can't tell the difference between HERCULES braided line and other more expensive brands. - From verified fishing gear purchase reviews.

Superior Cast Experience - 8X strands braided with DIAMOND WEAVE structure, smoother and rounder for casting much farther. Super silky and thin diameter and low memory, fishing reel capacity is better.
Great Knot Strength & Abrasion Resistance - Made from UHMWPE, the world's strongest PE fiber, enhanced coating technology for more durable use, killing nightmares of losing the big one.
Zero Stretch & High Sensitivity - No stretch, incredible sensitivity to detect even the slightest fish bite on your baits, and have faster, more powerful hooksets.

name: KastKing SuperPower Braided Fishing Line - Abrasion Resistant Braided Lines – Incredible Superline – Zero Stretch – Smaller Diameter – A Must-Have!
short_description: Strong Knot Strength - Dynamically incorporated strands in KastKing SuperPower Braided Lines allow you to easily tie a more solid knot; you can even tie an improved clinch knot. The special proprietary treatment (without a waxy coating) allows the supple fishing line to zip through the guides to your target and gives you better lure swimming action.

Great Abrasion Resistance & Low Memory - SuperPower braid offers superior abrasion resistance and reduced line memory, minimizing wind knots and improving casting distance for a more reliable fishing experience.

Wide Assortment of Colors & Strengths - SuperPower braided fishing line is available in 9 colors (Moss Green, Gray, Yellow, Blue, Multi-Color, Blue Camo, Sky Blue, Grass Camo, and Camo) and strengths from 6lb to 150lb, in spool lengths ranging from 150 to 1097 yards, ensuring a perfect match for various fishing conditions.

Ultra High Sensitivity & Zero Stretch - SuperPower braid is highly sensitive. It has almost zero stretch and provides instant feedback when you get even the slightest bit. It will also help you identify if your lure is working correctly and you'll be able to easily feel bottom structure, or other obstacles and will be able to adjust your presentations according to conditions. Zero stretch also means faster, more powerful hook sets.

Small Diameter - The small diameter means you can use a thin line without giving up strength or line capacity. Superpower braided fishing line will also allow you to use a larger diameter or strong line and still have plenty of line capacity.

name: ThonrsLine Force Braided Fishing Line - Incredible Abrasion Resistant Braided Lines for Saltwater or Freshwater - Camo Design Braid for Extra Visibility
short_description: Strength & Toughness - The Force Braided fishing line is made with German imported raw materials and the aggressive "rock weave" process. This braided fishing line is designed to be super tough, undergo a unique machine-induced reverse spin, pre-treatment, and withstand the most demanding conditions; when you need braided fishing line that's as tough as rock, trust only The Force GT fishing line.

ULTRA ABRASION RESISTANCE - The Force braid is constructed from a fully engineered, proprietary generation of high molecular weight polyethylene fibers. High molecular weight polyethylene fiber is an enhanced ultra-high molecular weight polyethylene material that provides extreme tensile strength. The abrasion resistant fiber is 120% stronger than others, giving you complete confidence in your fishing line under extreme conditions in both fresh and saltwater.

SPECIAL GT COATING TECH - The braided line's special GT coating technology provides enhanced smoothness for superior castability. The smooth surface texture allows it to sail through guides more quietly than other braided lines, increasing casting distance & accuracy by 7.30% and reducing line vibration.

ALL-WEATHER AND ENVIRONMENTAL ADAPTABILITY - Our ThornsLine Force braided fishing line combines the characteristics required for different fishing methods in Europe and America. It is then combined with different fishing environments and fish species, selecting the best size and color to make it a versatile warrior that can fight on any battlefield and is the perfect braid line for the toughest fishing conditions such as fishing around bridge structures or heavy cover/vegetation.

PROVEN CASTABILITY & LONGER LASTING - Force Braid fishing line is proven to retain 95.6% of its tensile strength through 1,200 test cycles, 1.2X more than other UHWMPE. A smooth fluoropolymer coating allows for more efficient casts and 17.29% longer casting distance.

name: KastKing Superpower ColorShield Braided Fishing Line - Colorfast Braided Line, 100% Solution Dyed UHMWPE Fiber, Smooth & Strong Superline, Near Zero Stretch, Sensitive, High Abrasion Resistance
short_description: Colorfast Permanent Coloration Process – The KastKing SuperPower Colorshield 4X Braided Fishing Line is engineered with solution dyed UHMWPE for colorfast properties. Solution dyeing ensures that the color remains for the life of the line and does not bleed, maintaining its visual appearance. This line features excellent colorfast properties, retaining its vibrant color with continued use, even after repeated exposure to sunlight, water, and harsh fishing conditions.

High Knot Strength – The high knot strength of the KastKing SuperPower Colorshield 4X Braided Fishing Line allows for effective casting, retrieving, and fighting fish without worrying about knot failures that could lead to lost fish.

Low Memory – With its low memory properties, the KastKing SuperPower Colorshield 4X Braided Fishing Line stays supple and flexible, enabling anglers to achieve more realistic lure presentations and enhanced sensitivity to detect even the most subtle bites.

High Abrasion Resistance – With its high abrasion resistance, the KastKing SuperPower Colorshield 4X Braided Fishing Line reduces the likelihood of fraying, damage, or breakage when in contact with rough surfaces or underwater obstacles. Anglers can trust in the high abrasion resistance of this line to handle encounters with sharp objects such as rocks, or submerged branches, providing peace of mind that the line will hold up to the most challenging fishing conditions.

Near Zero Stretch – With exceptional sensitivity, the KastKing SuperPower Colorshield 4X Braided Fishing Line enables anglers to detect changes in bottom composition, variations in structure, and subtle movements of their bait, enhancing their overall fishing success.

Bright & Long-Lasting Color - Say goodbye to fishing lines that quickly lose their color over time. Exceptional Abrasion Resistance - Built to withstand the harshest fishing environments, Runcl braided line boasts high abrasion resistance, allowing you to fish around rocks, logs, and vegetation without worrying about wear and tear. It’s designed for those who fish in challenging spots

Versatile - Ideal for both saltwater and freshwater fishing, this braided line’s smaller diameter allows you to spool more line on your reel. Whether you're fishing in ponds, lakes, or streams, it’s the perfect solution for any adventure, with the strength to take on any challenge
